creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Joe Brotherton
description: two bamboo trees at far L edge; front tree is darker and larger, extends off edge at UL; rear tree is lighter, narrower, grows straight upward; small branch from rear tree extends towards URC with dark foliage; dark foliage patches at far L edges
markings: LLC, red relief stamp: 吉隆之印 {Yoshitaka no in}
title: Bamboo
